description:
Evolving the popular Crush lantern, the Crush Chroma adds an array of colours to your camp lighting. Bright enough to keep an after-dinner card game going, its multiple colour modes are also great for the kids’ tent, or a little fireside family dance party. With its lightweight, collapsible design, up 60 lumens of light, and built-in solar panel, this compact lantern has a lot to offer.

  • 4 different white lighting modes: high – 60 lumens for 3 hours, medium – 25 lumens for 6 hours, low – 6 lumens for 35 hours, and candle flicker for 3.5 hours. As well as 6 different coloured modes and a coloured fade-in-fade-out mode
  • Candle mode gives a twinkling (and safe) candlelight ambiance to any situation
  • Easy 1-button interface
  • Charges easily via micro-USB, going from 0 to full in just 2.5 hours from the wall, 20 hours from the integrated solar panel or 2.5 hours from a larger compatible solar panel
  • LED charging indicator lets you know how your battery is doing, charging or discharging
  • Collapsible housing lets you angle the panel for optimal solar charging
  • Compact design is easy to pack, collapsed dimensions: 12.5 x 12.5 x 1.5 cm, expands to 12.5 x 12.5 x 10cm
  • In the box: Crush Light Chroma Lantern and micro-USB Cord (for charging)
name: Goal Zero Crush Light Chroma Lantern
